Package com.github.basking2.sdsai.io

Class FileRing

java.lang.Object
com.github.basking2.sdsai.io.FileRing
public class FileRing extends Object
A collection of static methods to help FileRingInputStream and FileRingOutputStream operate. This also acts as a parameter wrapper. A File Ring is a collection of N data files and one meta data file. The meta data file stores the value of N and the last written to file number, from zero to N-1. When data is written to a File Ring, on each write some predicate is evaluated to see if the next file should be written to. If true, then the current file value is incremented and moduloed by N to produce the next file number. That file is truncated, the metadata file is updated, and the new data file is written to. In this way a set of files in which N-1 are complete is maintained. This allows for fast append and scanning read operations. The intended use is for an archive of limited size in which reads are rare and may take some time.

    • buildInputStreamIterator

      public static Iterator<FileInputStream> buildInputStreamIterator(File dir, String prefix, String suffix, int number, int ringSize)
      Build an iterator that produces FileInputStream. The built iterator is suitable for passing to ConcatinatedInputStream.
      Parameters:
      dir - The directory that holds the files.
      prefix - The prefix.
      suffix - The suffix.
      number - The file to start reading at.
      ringSize - The ring size.
      Returns:
      An iterator that lazily creates FileInputStream objects.

    • getCurrentFileNumberAndSize

      public static int[] getCurrentFileNumberAndSize(File dir, String prefix, String suffix) throws IOException
      Read the meta file from a file ring and return an array with the current file number and the ring size as elements.
      Parameters:
      dir - The directory holding the files.
      prefix - The prefix.
      suffix - The suffix.
      Returns:
      An array of [current_file, ring_size] or [0, 0] if no meta file exists.
      Throws:
      IOException - On errors reading a meta file that exists.

    • getCurrentFile

      public static File getCurrentFile(File dir, String prefix, String suffix) throws IOException
      Return file in the ring that is currently being written to, according to the meta file.
      Parameters:
      dir - The directory.
      prefix - The prefix.
      suffix - The suffix.
      Returns:
      The file that is currently being written to.
      Throws:
      IOException - On errors.

    • writeMeta

      public static void writeMeta(File dir, String prefix, String suffix, int num, int ringSize) throws IOException
      Write the meta data file, those values returned by getCurrentFileNumberAndSize(File, String, String).
      Parameters:
      dir - The directory that holds data.
      prefix - The file prefix.
      suffix - The file suffix.
      num - The current file.
      ringSize - The ring size.
      Throws:
      IOException - On a writing error.

    • list

      public static File[] list(File dir, String prefix, String suffix, int number, int ringSize)
      List the current files, starting with listened one.
      Parameters:
      dir - Directory.
      prefix - Prefix.
      suffix - Suffix.
      number - Number.
      ringSize - Ring size.
      Returns:
      The list of file objects. Not all of these may exist.
